name: Sweetmaker [demo]
description:
This is a project made for OtomeJam 2022! It's also the first project made by LOVExLAB! I hope to release more games in the future!

    I really wanted it to be a full game but things came up for our artist and we lost a lot of time. qwq

    So this game is a demo! I may pick it up again if I happen to find people willing to join me in making a silly game about sweets.

CREDITS:

    All character artwork and character sprites belong to AkinaFalls. Her DA is "AkinaFalls" and her insta is "Akina16Falls".

My tech support and proofreader, the amazing Ashley Fairfoot with "Teapot Panic", helped me so, so, so much!

The writing, programing, title screen, menu, chibi art, and all other art that isn't a character was done by me, B.B.! I used Ren'py 8.0 to make it!

All the music in the demo comes from www.purple-planet.com. All the SFX come from www.freesfx.co.uk.
